page.title: 09SCHOOLDAYS YESTERDAY & TODAY
page.content: 1 Today there are only two classes, infants and juniors. The Headteacher is Mrs Paul and she teaches the juniors. There are three classrooms and the third one is used for television, singing, assembly and woodwork. The school secretary is Mrs Beck and she comes to work in the office every morning.Our dinners are delivered from Aylesham Secondary School. Only four children have school dinners, the rest either go home or bring packed lunches. Mr. Ian Hawkins, our vicar ,comes into school every week to take assembly. The school has two playing fields and a swimming pool.We have two guinea pigs which are very friendly.Children take it in turns to take the guinea pigs home during the holidays.
